name: Astrophobia (StailloGaming)
description:
Have you ever looked up at the night sky and felt something looking back..?

Extremely short game, 1-3 minute gameplay.

CONTROLS:

WASD - move

MOUSE - move camera

E - interact

CREDITS:

Created by: Staillo Gaming

Music by: YouTube Audio Library

"Black Mass" by Brian Bolger

"Rain Fuse" by French Fuse

HOW TO DOWNLOAD:

- Download the Astrophobia.zip file

- Open the .zip file in downloads & extract all

- Open Astrophobia.exe & enjoy!
